text: The Subaru BRAT, short for "Bi-drive Recreational All-terrain Transporter", known outside Canada and the United States as the 284 in the United Kingdom, Brumby in Australia, and Shifter, MV, or Targa in other markets, was a pickup truck that was made by Subaru from 1978 until 1994. The Subaru BRAT was an all-wheel drive automobile. == Related pages == * Subaru * Subaru Sambar == References == BRAT Category:Pickup trucks Category:1970s automobiles Category:1980s automobiles
title: Subaru Brat
